name: Silly Pig
description:
A very small game I made for myself, inspired by the Trijam n°171's theme, "watch your steps". I didn't participate in the trijam but I put myself in the same conditions. 

Little pig has been cursed, he must eat apples on his way to escape the witch or he'll die from exhaustion! spend your energy carefully!

Based on a true story.

Key arrows to move, enter to retry/validate.
